snippet: The International Swaps and Derivatives Association ruled that Greece's debt restructuring would prompt payouts on credit-default swaps tied to the country's government bonds.
abstract: The International Swaps and Derivatives Association ruled that Greece's debt restructuring would prompt payouts on credit-default swaps tied to the country's government bonds.

headline.main: Debt Insurance in Greece Must Pay Out, Ruling Says
headline.print_headline: Debt Insurance in Greece Must Pay Out, Ruling Says
